segments.text: Look , Mary ! There are so many people over there !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I remember , there is a job fair in the personnel market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have never been to the personnel market .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I have been there several times .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . The personnel market is a place specially for job-hunters and employers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So there will be many large companies in the personnel market , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there are many famous corporations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When will there be a job fair ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I need to pay to go into the personnel market ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about going there to have a look now ?
segments.speaker: S1
